DataElement.preferredName: Reduced Intensity Negation Myeloablative Chemotherapy Preparative Regimen Reason Occurrence Yes No Character Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not there a particular reason for the reduced intensity / non-myeloablative chemotherapy preparative regimen occurred.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Reduced Intensity Negation Myeloablative Chemotherapy Preparative Regimen Reason Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Made less in size or amount or degree._The degree or magnitude of strength, energy, or feeling._An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction._The administration of high-dose chemotherapy, with or without total body irradiation, to eradicate the underlying disease and/or ablate the immune system of the patient._The chemotherapy and/or radiation given to bone marrow transplant patients prior to transplant to kill diseased cells and/or make space for healthy new marrow and/or suppress the immune system so graft rejection does not occur._An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Reduced Intensity Negation Myeloablative Chemotherapy Preparative Regimen
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Reduced; made less in size or amount or degree.:The degree or magnitude of strength, energy, or feeling.:An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.:The administration of high-dose chemotherapy, with or without total body irradiation, to eradicate the underlying disease and/or ablate the immune system of the patient.:The chemotherapy and/or radiation given to bone marrow transplant patients prior to transplant to kill diseased cells and/or make space for healthy new marrow and/or suppress the immune system so graft rejection does not occur.

Concepts.definition: Made less in size or amount or degree.
The degree or magnitude of strength, energy, or feeling.
An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.
The administration of high-dose chemotherapy, with or without total body irradiation, to eradicate the underlying disease and/or ablate the immune system of the patient.

The chemotherapy or radiation given prior to blood, marrow, cord blood transplant, or cell infusion to kill diseased cells and make space for the healthy new graft and/or suppress the immune system so rejection does not occur.

Property.preferredDefinition: An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.:Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Concepts.definition: An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator of Yes or No to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Updated to add NCIt concept relationship. Updated VM Short Name to be the Public ID to be consistent with current convention for VM Short Name - DW 10-03-2022
ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ReferenceDocuments.description: Did a particular reason for the non-myeloablative / reduced intensity preparative regimen occur?
